hero.title:
Hi! I'm a Student
+ Web Developer
hero.description: I'm a student at the University of Applied Sciences Berlin (HTW Berlin). I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for building web applications using modern technologies. I'm currently looking for opportunities to work on exciting projects and collaborate with other developers.
hero.description2: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for building web applications using modern technologies.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: These are the different stacks i learned or began to learn during my journey as a web developer, these mainly through self-learning.

firstPortfolio.name: First Portfolio
firstPortfolio.description: This is my first portfolio website, built with HTML and CSS.

javascriptCalculator.name: JavaScript Calculator
javascriptCalculator.description: A simple functional calculator built with JavaScript.

simpleReactBlog.name: Simple React Blog
simpleReactBlog.description: A simple single-page blog built with React and Bootstrap CSS.

symfonyBlog.name: Symfony Blog
symfonyBlog.description: A facebook-like web app built with Symfony.

socialNetworkPHP.name: Social Network PHP
socialNetworkPHP.description: A member connection system coupled with a blog system built with PHP.

frontEndDevelopment.title: Front-End Development
frontEndDevelopment.description: I develop the front-end of websites using the latest technologies and frameworks such as React, TailwindCSS, and Sass.

backEndDevelopment.title: Back-End Development
backEndDevelopment.description: I help creating dynamic websites by manipulating the server using PHP and its popular Framework Symfony.

responsiveDevelopment.title: Responsive Development
responsiveDevelopment.description: Using my front-end background, i develop websites that are responsive and work smoothly on all devices for better user experience.

devopsAndVersionControl.title: DevOps and Version Control
devopsAndVersionControl.description: I use Git for version control and deploy websites using scripts in Maker Bundle and an Ubuntu server.

contact.title: Let's work together!
contact.description: I'm always ready to start new projects and learn new technologies. You can contact me with this form, so that we can work together.
